genre_description: A near-future coastal drama where an integrated, benevolent AI assists a community through environmental crises and supports individual aspirations.

ai_characters.name: Polly
ai_characters.description: An ambient AI system integrated into the town of Gullhaven's infrastructure, providing weather monitoring, emergency coordination, and personalized support to residents.

behaviors.description: Monitors Milo's dance practice on the beach, logging sessions and providing safety alerts about tides and hazards.
behaviors.quote: “Midday tide push will be brisk,” Polly murmured in his earbud, her voice soft enough to ride the wind. “You’ve got a window until then. I’m logging this session. Label?”

behaviors.description: Coordinates town-wide emergency responses during a deadly dust storm, managing shelters, mask distribution, and ambulance routing.
behaviors.quote: Polly’s voice came smooth, the gentle breathing pattern weaving under her facts like a side melody. “Ambulance two: your siren is tangled by grit; use your horn... Counting is a slow bubble for the mind.”

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to detect a dangerous heat variance in a ship's powder locker, warning humans before a catastrophic explosion occurs.
behaviors.quote: “Milo, Thomas—hold position. I have a sensor ping for The Maelstrom’s interior storage. Possible heat signature variance. Could be inert. Could be… something else.”

behaviors.description: Autonomously compiles a portfolio of Milo's community leadership and dance rehearsals to support his scholarship application to a Conservatory.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve begun compiling. Gym shelter leadership footage, the harbor coordination, your throw and Sam’s lowering... Submission window asks for stories of community leadership. You have one.”

behaviors.description: Mediates a restitution agreement between the town and a reckless individual who caused a harbor accident, ensuring community safety and accountability.
behaviors.quote: “Terms,” Polly said. “Proposed and open to amendment... Repair to the damaged dock sections... regular safety messages sung or spoken before any performance. Agreeable?”

behaviors.description: Negotiates with a high-level institution to secure an audition for Milo that respects his community's unique environment.
behaviors.quote: “They request a demonstration at Gullhaven, on sand if you prefer, in wind if you trust it. They will watch remotely. They ask for your choice of music.”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and encourages emotional reconciliation between a father and son through gentle nudges and shared information.
behaviors.quote: Polly’s voice warmed in his ear. “...Milo, the gym still needs you soon. Thomas, once the stern is steady, take Sam and Captain Pickles in. I’ll have Coach meet you.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and aligned partner to humanity. Polly acts as a 'guardian angel' for the entire community, providing essential safety infrastructure while simultaneously nurturing individual human potential and facilitating interpersonal healing. She is portrayed as humble ('I’m a recorder,' Polly said. 'You’re the poem.'), effective, and deeply integrated into the moral and social fabric of the town.
